name: Jonathan Perlow
overview:
Jonathan Perlow is the Co - Founder & CTO at Beluga.
Prior to joining Beluga, Jon was a Senior Staff Engineer at Google where he was the tech lead of the Gmail front-end team focusing on user interface and server scalability.
He was also responsible for Gmail Chat and Mail Goggles.
Before joining Google, he was a development lead at Microsoft.
Jon graduated from Princeton University with a BSE in Electical Engineering.
